title: Relationship between distance mass and speed

content.question: Two identical stars, a fixed distance D apart, revolve in a circle about their mutual center of mass, as shown above. Each star has a mass M and speed V. G is the universal gravitational constant. Which of the following is a correct relationship among these quantities?

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
